chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has the above problem:

Good morning, dear team,

I ordered my iPhone 12 on August 15, 2023 with 100% battery power.

Now the battery life is at 82%, after just nine months. Since I've only charged the phone once a day, the 500 charge cycles that have already occurred are not applicable.

If the battery life drops so rapidly, I won't be able to use my phone without a power bank or new battery in a year, and then the phone would still be less than two years old.

Thank you in advance and best regards,

Thanks for your help,

Hello Celina, You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Just drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of locations here: Before you prepare your return, please follow these steps: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item here: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions 2. Don't forget to include all accessories that came with your product. 3. Remove any protective film or wrapping. 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below. How to package: • The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product situated so it won't move during transit. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a backup label inside for identification in case the original label is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both the inside and outside before shipping. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be sent! We'll notify you when it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist außerhalb der Garantie.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

We confirmed the receipt of the device. Unfortunately, the battery warranty for our phones is one month. Hence this device is out of warranty and hence non compliant. Kindly check with the customer if the address below is correct. Thank you.

Celina Hof
Bührerstrasse 40
71640 Ludwigsburg
Germany
01578 5799126
shipping_14525772_31849590@eu.perso-email.com

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Back Market’s internal technical team has reviewed the warranty exclusion associated with this device and determined that it is not justified in this case.

If you don’t agree with this assessment you can open a dispute via the Seller Support Center.

Regardless, please ensure that the device is either repaired or replaced within 3 business days of receiving it (5 business days for MacBooks, laptops, and heavy/bulky appliances). 


You may also choose to refund the customer. If so, the refund must be processed within 2 business days of receiving the device. If this does not happen, we will proceed with the refund directly.


Thanks for your cooperation and understanding in resolving this as quickly as possible.


Best, 
Sila, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Please refer to the quality charter. Section 3.4.2 states that:

"If your customer opens a technical service request within 6 months of receiving their item and the item’s
battery state is below 80%, you must replace the battery (on top of any other necessary repairs).

The battery warranty is only 1 month. The customer's battery health is still above 80% after 6 months. This drop is likely due to normal usage of the phone over time. Therefore, the device is out of warranty. We have already returned the device to the customer. TN: 10084001751712

Regards,
RK

Hello Celina,

You will find your return label attached to this message. Your return will be processed by Chronopost. Just drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. You can find a list of drop-off locations here:

To prepare your return:
1. Follow the instructions on this link: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions
2. Don't forget to include all accessories that came with your product
3. Remove any existing protection film or cover
4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below

How to package:
• The box should be strong and sturdy, and your product should be positioned inside so it can't move during transport.
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a backup label inside for identification in case the original one is lost or damaged).
• Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before sending. This protects you in case your product is damaged during transport.

Your return is now ready to drop off! We'll let you know when it arrives at our location.

Best regards,
Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hello,  

Customer want refund.  

Will send the device back to you.  

Please refund, after receive it.  

Regards, 
Aysah, from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We will check the device once we received the parcel. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Hello,  

Customer want refund.  

Please refund, after receive it.  

Regards, 
Aysah, from Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

Noted with thanks.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile

According to the Quality Charter, you are obliged to repair or replace the device with a new battery if the battery capacity falls below 90% within one year. The device has been sent to you again. Please initiate a refund as you failed to replace the battery the first time.

Thank you.

Regards,
Gurcan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Section 3.4.2 of the Quality Charter states that:

"If your customer opens a technical service request within 6 months of receiving their item and the item’s
battery state is below 80%, you must replace the battery (on top of any other necessary repairs)."

The customer's battery health is still above 80% after 10 months. This drop is likely due to normal usage of the phone over time. Therefore, we are unable to refund the customer and replace the battery of the device.

Regards,
JH

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

May we also know where in the Quality Charter does it state that we are obliged to repair or replace the device with a new battery if the battery capacity falls below 90% within one year?

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

You can read it in the appendix.

Thank you

Regards,
Gurcan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

In which part of the appendix does it state that?

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

This appendix is very short and everything is clearly visible.

Regards,
Gurcan from the Back Care Team
